item.title: X 在埃隆-马斯克领导下的波折历程
item.description: X 公司首席执行官琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）周三出人意料地表示，她将离职，结束在伊隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下社交媒体平台的任期。【原文：The CEO of X, Linda Yaccarino, said on Wednesday she would step down from the role in a surprise move, ending her tenure at the Elon Musk-owned social media platform that has faced several controversies and challenges including a mass exodus of advertisers from the site.】

item.title: 据 Folha 报道，摩洛哥皇家航空公司正在洽谈购买巴西航空工业公司的飞机
item.description: 圣保罗页报》（Folha de S.Paulo）周三援引摩洛哥皇家航空公司首席执行官阿卜杜勒哈米德-阿德农（Abdelhamid Adnoun）的话报道说，摩洛哥皇家航空公司正在与巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）就可能订购该公司的 E2 飞机进行谈判。【原文：Royal Air Maroc is in talks with Embraer for a potential order for the Brazilian planemaker' s E2 aircraft, newspaper Folha de S.Paulo reported on Wednesday citing the airline's CEO, Abdelhamid Adnoun.】

item.title: 美国对南非征收关税将打击白人农民 特朗普表示支持
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对南非出口商品征收 30% 的关税，这必将对他曾大声疾呼并备受争议的群体--白人农民--造成经济打击。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened 30% tariff on South African exports is set to deal an economic blow to a community he has vocally and controversially championed: white farmers.】

item.title: 通用汽车支持的 EnergyX 公司购买美国 Smackover 地层富锂矿区
item.description: 由通用汽车公司（General Motors）支持的锂技术初创公司 EnergyX 从 Pantera Lithium 手中买下了 Smackover 地层中的 3.5 万英亩土地，这是为获得盛产电池金属的美国卤水地层而达成的最新交易。【原文：EnergyX, the lithium technology startup backed by General Motors , has bought 35,000 acres in the Smackover formation from Pantera Lithium , the latest deal for access to the U.S. brine formation teeming with supplies of the battery metal.】

item.title: 关税威胁导致铜供应过剩，美国铜价泡沫破灭
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对铜征收 50%的关税，使美国金属价格出现创纪录的溢价。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's 50% tariff on copper has placed a record premium on prices of the metal in the United States that is likely to ease over the coming months as a stockpile created by traders anticipating the levy works through the system.】

item.title: 谷歌称搜索结果不和谐问题尚未解决；面临欧盟反垄断罚款风险
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌（Google）本周表示，它未能解决与酒店、航空公司和 Skyscanner 等专业搜索服务公司在如何呈现搜索结果方面的分歧，这使它面临被欧盟处以巨额反垄断罚款的风险。【原文：Alphabet's Google said it failed this week to resolve disagreements with hotels, airlines and specialised search services such as Skyscanner over how it presents search results, putting it at risk of a hefty European Union antitrust fine.】

item.title: 智利和墨西哥为特朗普宣布征收铜关税做好准备
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）周三表示，墨西哥可以重新安排通常运往美国的铜，以避免特朗普政府征收关税；而智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）则表示，他尚未收到美国方面的回复，并呼吁进行 "官方 "沟通。【原文：President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Wednesday Mexico could redirect the copper it typically sends to the U.S. to avoid tariffs from the Trump administration, while her Chilean counterpart Gabriel Boric said he had yet to hear from the U.S. and called for "official" communication.】

item.title: 保时捷预计 4 月和 5 月将面临 3.51 亿美元的关税打击
item.description: 保时捷这家豪华跑车制造商在季度业绩公布前的投资者电话会议后发布的幻灯片中表示，由于在4月和5月吸收了美国的进口关税，该公司的业绩预计将受到3亿欧元（3.51亿美元）的冲击。【原文：Porsche expects a 300 million euro ($351 million) hit to results as a consequence of absorbing U.S. import tariffs in April and May, the luxury sportscar manufacturer said in slides published after an investor call ahead of quarterly results.】

item.title: 特朗普向六国发出关税信函
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三向阿尔及利亚、文莱、伊拉克、利比亚、摩尔多瓦和菲律宾等六个国家发出了一轮关税函。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday issued a round of tariff letters to six countries, including Algeria, Brunei, Iraq, Libya, Moldova and the Philippines.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国利率至少高出 3 个点
item.description: "他说："'为时已晚'使美国每年在再融资成本上损失 3,600 亿美元。【原文："'Too Late' is costing the U.S. 360 Billion Dollars a Point, Per Year, in refinancing costs," he said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）数据显示，美元在全球储备中让位于欧元，瑞士法郎大放异彩
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的数据显示，2025 年第一季度，美元在向该组织报告的全球货币储备中所占的份额略微下降至 57.7%，而以欧元计价的储备份额则有所上升。【原文：The U.S. dollar's share of global currency reserves reported to the International Monetary Fund nudged lower to 57.7% in the first quarter of 2025 while the share of euro-denominated reserves gained, International Monetary Fund data showed.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，石油巨头沙特阿美公司正与英联邦液化天然气公司洽谈承购协议
item.description: 四位人士周三告诉路透社，石油巨头沙特阿美公司（Saudi Aramco）正在与联邦液化天然气公司（Commonwealth LNG）谈判，从该公司位于路易斯安那州卡梅伦的设施购买液化天然气，以加强其在超冷燃料市场的地位。【原文：Oil giant Saudi Aramco is in talks with Commonwealth LNG to buy liquefied natural gas from the U.S. company's facility in Cameron, Louisiana, as it seeks to strengthen its position in the superchilled fuel market, four people told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 Perplexity 推出人工智能浏览器，与谷歌 Chrome 浏览器一较高下
item.description: 由 Nvidia 支持的 Perplexity AI 公司周三表示，它已经推出了一款具有人工智能搜索功能的新网络浏览器 Comet，这家初创公司希望挑战市场领导者 Alphabet 的谷歌 Chrome 浏览器的主导地位。【原文：Nvidia-backed Perplexity AI said on Wednesday it has launched Comet, a new web browser with AI-powered search capabilities, as the startup looks to challenge the dominance of market leader Alphabet's Google Chrome.】

item.title: 独家报道TikTok 准备在美国使用自己的算法和用户数据开发应用程序
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TikTok 正准备为美国用户推出一款独立的应用程序，该应用程序预计将采用与其全球应用程序不同的算法和数据系统，从而为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普策划的潜在出售奠定基础。【原文：TikTok is preparing to launch a standalone app for U.S. users that is expected to operate on a separate algorithm and data system from its global app, laying the groundwork for a potential sale orchestrated by U.S. President Donald Trump, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: X 首席执行官亚卡里诺意外下台
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下社交平台 X 的首席执行官琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）周三出人意料地表示，她将辞去公司最高职务。【原文：Linda Yaccarino, CEO of Elon Musk-owned social platform X, said on Wednesday she would step down from the top role in a surprise move.】

item.title: VIEW 英伟达成为首家市值突破 4 万亿美元的公司
item.description: 本周三，英伟达市值达到 4 万亿美元，成为全球首家达到这一里程碑的上市公司，并巩固了其作为华尔街最受欢迎股票之一的地位。【原文：Nvidia notched a market capitalization of $4 trillion on Wednesday, making it the first public company in the world to reach the milestone and solidifying its position as one of Wall Street's most-favored stocks.】

item.title: 三星对可折叠手机的押注面临重大考验，新机型更轻薄
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周三推出了更薄、更轻的新型可折叠手机，其目标是在利润率更高的高端市场抵御中国的竞争。【原文：Samsung Electronics on Wednesday unveiled thinner, lighter new foldable phones as it aims to fend off Chinese competition in the higher-margin, premium segment that remains untapped by arch rival Apple .】

item.title: Nvidia 在以色列的扩张计划促使多方提供场地
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，Nvidia 收到了大量潜在选址意向，以帮助其实施在以色列大幅扩展业务的计划，满足对人工智能数据中心日益增长的需求。【原文：Nvidia has received a high number of offers of potential sites to help it carry out a plan to greatly expand its operations in Israel to meet growing demand for artificial intelligence data centres, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 摩洛哥将建设由可再生能源驱动的数据中心
item.description: 摩洛哥数字转型部长表示，摩洛哥计划建立一个由可再生能源供电的 500 兆瓦国有数据中心，以加强数据存储的安全性。【原文：Morocco plans to build a 500 megawatt state-owned data centre powered by renewable energy to strengthen security of data storage, its digital transition minister said.】

item.title: 英伟达成为首家市值突破 4 万亿美元的公司
item.description: 本周三，英伟达市值达到 4 万亿美元，成为全球首家达到这一里程碑的上市公司，并巩固了其作为华尔街最受欢迎股票之一的地位。【原文：Nvidia notched a market capitalization of $4 trillion on Wednesday, making it the first public company in the world to reach the milestone and solidifying its position as one of Wall Street's most-favored stocks.】

item.title: 捷克政府禁止在公共管理部门使用 DeepSeek
item.description: 捷克总理彼得-菲亚拉（Petr Fiala）周三表示，出于安全考虑，捷克政府禁止捷克公共管理部门使用中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的任何服务。【原文：The Czech government banned usage of any services of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek in the Czech public administration due to security concerns, Prime Minister Petr Fiala said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 设备维护初创公司 MaintainX 最新融资估值 25 亿美元
item.description: MaintainX 周三表示，该公司在最新一轮融资中筹集了 1.5 亿美元，使这家设备维护初创公司的估值达到 25 亿美元。【原文：MaintainX has raised $150 million in its latest fundraising round, valuing the equipment maintenance startup at $2.5 billion, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 瑞银首席执行官告诉《福克斯商业》：瑞银将继续在美国寻找机会
item.description: 瑞士银行首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）在福克斯商业频道的 "与玛丽亚共度的早晨 "节目中表示，瑞银继续在美国看到很多机会。【原文：UBS continues to see a lot of opportunity in the United States, the Swiss bank's CEO Sergio Ermotti told Fox Business' "Mornings with Maria" program.】

item.title: 预计关税动荡将使全球银行交易收入增长 10
item.description: 根据分析公司 Crisil Coalition Greenwich 的估计，由于交易商因美国关税政策的变化而套现，包括美国顶级贷款机构在内的全球银行预计市场收入将增长 10%。【原文：Global banks including top U.S. lenders are expected to report a 10% gain in markets revenue as traders cashed in on shifting U.S. tariff policies, according to estimates from analysis firm Crisil Coalition Greenwich.】

item.title: ASML 在美国取消包容性和多样性目标
item.description: 荷兰半导体设备供应商阿斯麦公司（ASML）周三表示，为了遵守美国的法规，该公司已经放弃了在美国的包容性和多样性目标。【原文：Dutch semiconductor equipment supplier ASML has dropped its inclusion and diversity targets in the U.S. to comply with regulations there, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 金融稳定委员会称，监管机构应限制核心市场中 "影子银行 "的杠杆率
item.description: 金融稳定委员会（Financial Stability Board）周三在一系列旨在提高 "影子银行 "安全性的建议中表示，监管机构应考虑直接限制非银行金融公司在核心市场上使用的杠杆，并采取措施抑制其规模。【原文：Regulators should consider direct limits on leverage used by non-bank financial firms in core markets as well as measures to curb their size, the Financial Stability Board said on Wednesday in a series of recommendations to make 'shadow banking' safer.】

item.title: 欧盟本月寻求与特朗普达成贸易协议，新关税通知即将发布
item.description: 欧盟表示正在努力争取在本月底前与美国达成贸易协议，而美国总统唐纳德-特朗普则承诺将在本周三对未指明的国家发出进一步的关税通知。【原文：The European Union said it was working on sealing a trade deal with the United States by the end of the month, while U.S. President Donald Trump promised that he would deliver further tariff notices on unnamed countries on Wednesday.】

item.title: 关税波动促使投资者转向主动管理型基金
item.description: 今年，随着市场波动性因对美国关税的担忧而上升，以及股市涨势扩大到少数巨型科技股之外，全球投资者正转向主动管理型股票基金。【原文：Global investors are pivoting towards actively managed equity funds this year as market volatility rises on worries over U.S. tariffs and the stock market rally broadens beyond a few mega-cap tech stocks.】

item.title: 美国 7,500 美元税收减免即将结束，汽车制造商力推电动汽车销售
item.description: 汽车制造商正在敦促消费者在今年秋天美国7500美元的税收减免政策取消之前抢购电动汽车。【原文：Automakers are urging customers to snap up electric vehicles before a $7,500 U.S. tax credit goes away this fall.】

item.title: 中国工业部为汽车供应商开通付款问题投诉平台
item.description: 中国工业部周三表示，如果中国主要汽车制造商未能履行及时付款的承诺，该部将接受汽车供应商的投诉，旨在消除供应商对付款法规漏洞的担忧。【原文：China's industry ministry said on Wednesday that it would accept complaints from auto suppliers if major Chinese automakers fail to honor their commitment to timely payments, aiming to address suppliers' concerns over loopholes in payment regulations.】
